metadata.title: CVE-2023-4385 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in dbFree in fs/jfs/jfs_dmap.c inthe journaling file system (JFS) in the Linux Kernel. This issue may allowa local attacker to crash the system due to a missing sanity check.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1093.100').
